data.title: Teaching AI to Think Responsibly
data.description: Anthropic is challenging the world’s biggest AI players with a bold mission: to build systems that are both powerful and aligned with human values. The company’s president and cofounder, Daniela Amodei, will join WIRED’s Steven Levy for a candid conversation about Anthropic’s “constitutional” approach to AI safety, the race to develop ever-smarter models, and how to balance innovation with accountability.
data.author: Condé Nast
